price: Enyi mlio amini! Msiwe kama wale walio mtaabisha Musa, lakini Mwenyezi Mungu akamtakasa na waliyo yasema, naye alikuwa mwenye hishima mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاذَوۡاْ مُوسَىٰ فَبَرَّأَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِمَّا قَالُواْۚ وَكَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَجِيهٗا
footnotes: Enyi mlio amini! Msimuudhi Nabii kwa namna yoyote ya udhia, kama wale walio muudhi Musa katika kaumu yake. Na Mwenyezi Mungu akamtoa makosani na akamsafisha na hayo waliyo mzulia. Na Musa mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu alikuwa ni bwana mwenye hadhi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takūnū ka-alladhīna ādhaw mūsā fabarra-ahu al-lahu mimmā qālū wakāna ʿinda al-lahi wajīhan
